name: Dual Momentum SPY
description: Hold SPY when it shows positive absolute momentum (12-month ROC > 0), otherwise stay out
rationale: Based on Gary Antonacci's research - combines relative and absolute momentum. First place NAAIM award 2012, backtested to 215 years. During 2008: strategy UP 20%, S&P DOWN 40%. This simplified version uses absolute momentum only - stay invested when trend is positive, exit when negative. Avoids major drawdowns while capturing bull market gains.
